definitions.definition: At fault ; failing to fulfill responsibility , duty , or obligations .
examples: It would be remiss of me, in my duties, if I did not give credit where credit was due.

definitions.definition: Not energetic or exact in duty or business; careless; tardy; slack; hence, lacking earnestness or activity; languid; slow.

main_definition: At fault ; failing to fulfill responsibility , duty , or obligations .
secondary_definitions: Not energetic or exact in duty or business; careless; tardy; slack; hence, lacking earnestness or activity; languid; slow.
